name: agent-trace
description: Self-hosted observability for agentic coding workflows.

scripts.typecheck: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema typecheck && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector typecheck
scripts.test:unit: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema test:unit && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector test:unit
scripts.test:manual: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema test:manual && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector test:manual
scripts.test:feature:schema: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema typecheck && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema test:unit && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/schema test:manual
scripts.test:feature:collector: npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector typecheck && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector test:unit && npm run --workspace @agent-trace/collector test:manual
